<!--- This is an automatically generated file. DO NOT EDIT! --->

### USAGE ###
>        /files/browse

### TL;DR; ###
Returns a file listing for a directory.

### DESCRIPTION ###
Lists files and directories contained in the path as
a JSON object.

Query parameters:

>        path=VALUE          The path of directory to browse.
